Uses of Class
marytts.signalproc.analysis.PitchReaderWriter

Packages that use PitchReaderWriter
marytts.signalproc.adaptation.prosody Prosody transformation algorithms for voice conversion.
A prosody modification framework has been implemented which supports:
- Mean and standard deviation transformation of f0
- Sentence slope transformation
 
marytts.signalproc.analysis A collection of analysis algorithms for signal processing.
Important classes are as follows:
 
marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis Analysis package for harmonics plus noise speech models.
